about.title: About SV Exim
about.subtitle: For nearly two decades, we've been the trusted partner for industrial and marine equipment, serving clients worldwide with unwavering commitment to quality and excellence.

storyContent.p1: Founded in 2005 in the industrial hub of Bhavnagar, Gujarat, SV Exim began as a vision to provide high-quality industrial equipment to the growing manufacturing sector in India. What started as a small operation has grown into a globally recognized supplier of industrial and marine equipment.
storyContent.p2: Our journey has been marked by continuous growth, strategic expansion, and an unwavering commitment to customer satisfaction. Today, we serve clients across 50+ countries, from small-scale operations to large multinational corporations.
storyContent.p3: With over 5000 successful deliveries and a customer satisfaction rate of 99.8%, we've built our reputation on quality products, reliable service, and technical expertise that our clients can depend on.

about.missionContent: To provide world-class industrial and marine equipment solutions that enable our clients to achieve operational excellence and sustainable growth.
about.visionContent: To be the global leader in industrial and marine equipment supply, known for innovation, reliability, and exceptional customer partnerships.

2005.title: Company Founded
2005.description: Started as a small industrial equipment supplier in Bhavnagar

2008.title: Marine Division
2008.description: Expanded into marine equipment and offshore solutions

2012.title: International Expansion
2012.description: Started serving clients in Middle East and Southeast Asia

2016.title: Service Division Launch
2016.description: Introduced dedicated maintenance, repair, and on-site inspection services

2020.title: Digital Transformation
2020.description: Launched online platform and digital customer service

2024.title: Global Reach
2024.description: Now serving 50+ countries with 5000+ successful deliveries
